      DrawSystem(RpgGame game)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawSystem

        public DrawSystem(RpgGame game)
        Automatically sets up the comparator for sorting, and sets the priority to 1, meaning this system will be updated after UpdateSystem and before DestroySystem. Also stores a private instance of RpgGame.batch for drawing.
        Parameters:
        game - Our main game class.

    • Method Detail

      • processEntity

        protected void processEntity(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity entity,
                             float deltaTime)
        Draws each entity to the screen by calling DrawableEntity.draw(float, SpriteBatch).
        Specified by:
        processEntity in class com.badlogic.ashley.systems.SortedIteratingSystem
        Parameters:
        entity - A single entity to draw (passed automatically to this function by DrawSystem.
        deltaTime - The time since last frame.
